messages.message: @dlluncor do you know how we can hook into the `col_name_to_val_overrides` input to refiner? Can that be set in populate args? Or should we set it in the call directly?

hey @lydia — currently that feature was added for the Validate feature in Review OCR (when a user decides to “fix” the values of the Refiner result based on what they’ve manually typed in)

Technically you can pass that into the Refer Input I believe?

Currently populateArgs has no concept of this in the Populate Refiner Rows sense
